leave_dataset.description: Questions related to leave and work-life balance.
questions: Have you been able to take sufficient leave recently?
Do you feel you get enough time off to recharge?
Is your workload preventing you from taking planned breaks?

activity_tracker.description: Questions about daily workload and stress.
questions: Do you feel overwhelmed by your daily tasks?
How do you feel your workload affects your stress levels?
Do you find it hard to balance your tasks during the day?
What challenges are you facing in meeting your targets?
Do you receive enough feedback on your performance?
Do you feel recognized for your contributions?
How satisfied are you with the rewards system?
What changes would you like in the recognition process?
Did you feel supported during your initial days?
What improvements would have made your onboarding better?
How would you describe your mood today?
What factors contributed most to your current mood?
Is there anything that made you feel particularly happy or frustrated?
